data.title: Broad Town Church of England Primary School
data.meta_description: School Ratings for Broad Town Church of England Primary School, Broad Town, Wootton Bassett, Swindon, Wiltshire, SN4 7RE. This school was rated Good by Ofsted in September 2023. For it's latest set of KS2 results 63 percent of students met the expected standard in Reading, Writing and Maths and 19 percent of students met the higher standard.
data.text:
Type Primary Age Range 4-11 Religion Church of England Address Broad Town

Wootton Bassett

Swindon

Wiltshire

SN4 7RE Phone 01793731395 Reference Number 126306

Description

beta

Broad Town Church of England Primary School is a highly regarded educational institution located in Broad Town, near Swindon, United Kingdom, with a postcode of SN4 7RE. It is a church school with strong Christian values, dedicated to nurturing each child’s unique potential and social, emotional, spiritual, and academic growth. Noteworthy facts about the school include:

Broad Town CEP School was judged to be ‘Outstanding’ by Ofsted in January 2020 in all four inspection areas, ensuring a high-quality learning environment.

The school has open after-school clubs and offers a wide range of music and sporting opportunities to engage all students in diverse activities.

Broad Town CEP School is part of the Diocese of Bristol Academies Trust, joining a community with Bath and Westmoor Association of Church Schools.

The school encourages students’ spiritual, moral, social, and cultural development within the framework of Christian values, preparing them for the next stage of their education.

Broad Town Church of England Primary School is proud of its large, welcoming, and caring community, which offers an inclusive and supportive environment.

The school’s website provides further information about its curriculum, vision, and latest news, providing a comprehensive overview of the educational experiences it offers.
